Package controller

Interface Features

All Known Implementing Classes:
Controller
public interface Features
This is a Features interface which has all the methods which we need to display in our GUI menu. This Features interface will be called in IView so that we can add the ActionListeners and call these methods.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    buyStocks()
    This method is used to buy stocks on a particular date and add them to a particular portfolio.
    void
    createPortfolio()
    This method is used to create a flexible portfolio of a user.
    void
    createPortfolioUsingDollarCost()
    This method creates a portfolio (if not exists) or invests in a portfolio (if exists) according to the dollar cost averaging strategy.
    void
    getComposition()
    This method is used to determine the composition of a particular portfolio on a particular date.
    void
    getCostBasis()
    This method is used to determine the total cost basis of a particular portfolio on a particular date.
    void
    getPerformance()
    This method is used to determine the performance of a particular portfolio from a start dte to an end date.
    void
    getValuation()
    This method is used to determine the total valuation of a particular portfolio on a particular date.
    void
    investInPortfolio()
    This method is used to invest a certain amount entered by the user across a series of stocks based on their fractional weights.
    void
    loadPortfolio()
    This method is used to load a flexible portfolio.
    void
    sellStocks()
    This method is used to sell stocks on a particular date and update a particular portfolio.

  • Method Details

    • createPortfolio

      void createPortfolio()
      This method is used to create a flexible portfolio of a user. The portfolio name should not exist before and a new portfolio will be created.

    • buyStocks

      void buyStocks()
      This method is used to buy stocks on a particular date and add them to a particular portfolio. The commission fee is also asked here.

    • loadPortfolio

      void loadPortfolio()
      This method is used to load a flexible portfolio. After loading, you can do buy/sell and all other operations on the portfolio.

    • sellStocks

      void sellStocks()
      This method is used to sell stocks on a particular date and update a particular portfolio. The commission fee is also asked here.

    • getValuation

      void getValuation()
      This method is used to determine the total valuation of a particular portfolio on a particular date.

    • getCostBasis

      void getCostBasis()
      This method is used to determine the total cost basis of a particular portfolio on a particular date. The cost basis is the total amount invested in a particular portfolio which includes the commission fee.

    • getComposition

      void getComposition()
      This method is used to determine the composition of a particular portfolio on a particular date.

    • getPerformance

      void getPerformance()
      This method is used to determine the performance of a particular portfolio from a start dte to an end date. This performance is shown in a bar chart so corresponding to the dates, value of portfolio is shown.

    • investInPortfolio

      void investInPortfolio()
      This method is used to invest a certain amount entered by the user across a series of stocks based on their fractional weights.

    • createPortfolioUsingDollarCost

      void createPortfolioUsingDollarCost()
      This method creates a portfolio (if not exists) or invests in a portfolio (if exists) according to the dollar cost averaging strategy. This method allows the user to not specify an end date which means that the investment is still ongoing.
